output: 新法案还提出，将询问权扩大到覆盖 14 周岁以上的青少年，前提是这些人已经从事或可能从事不利于保护澳大利亚和人民免受出于政治动机的相关暴力活动。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Even if our intelligence agencies were the best in the world, conferring a power to compulsorily question anyone about information which "prejudices Australia's economic relations with another country," or activities which are "detrimental to Australia's interests" is beyond the pale.
output: 即使我们的情报机构在全世界首屈一指，赋予他们权力来强制性询问关于“有损澳大利亚与其他国家之间的经济关系”的信息或“有损澳大利亚利益”的行为都让人无法接受。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
We stand alone.
output: 我们孤立无援。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
No other Five Eyes country goes so far, not even for terrorism offences.
output: 即使是在发生恐怖主义行为的情况下，其他五眼联盟国家也没有如此过界。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Genuinely liberal democracies guard against authoritarian measures.
output: 真正自由的民主国家不会采用专制措施。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The conduct of our security agencies in relation to the bugging of the East Timor parliament, the trials of Witness K and Bernard Collaery, the secret trial and imprisonment of a former intelligence officer, the recent search warrants executed on two journalists, and the prospect of charges against one of them in relation to stories on suspected murders by Australian soldiers in Afghanistan show why we should not be lowering our guard.
output: 我国安全机构的种种行为——例如窃听东帝汶议会、审讯证人 K 和 Bernard Collaery、秘密审讯和羁押前情报人员，近期对两名记者实施搜查，并且其中一名记者还因报道了澳大利亚士兵在阿富汗涉嫌谋杀而面临指控——都在提醒我们不能放松警惕。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Bodies of mother, 2 infants found in car submerged in pond
output: 浸泡在池塘中的车里发现一位母亲和两名婴儿的尸体

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
AUGUSTA, Ga. -- Authorities pulled a submerged vehicle from a Georgia pond and found the bodies of a woman and her twin 10-month-old children inside.
output: 奥古斯塔（乔治亚州）——治安官在乔治亚州的一个池塘里打捞起一辆淹没在水中的汽车，并在车内发现一名女子和两名十个月大双胞胎的尸体。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The Richmond County Sheriff's Office said crews found the vehicle in Mayor's Pond in Augusta on Friday afternoon, The Augusta Chronicle reported.
output: 根据《奥古斯塔纪事报》报道，里士满县治安官办公室称，相关同事于周五下午在奥古斯塔的市长池塘 (Mayor's Pond) 里发现了这辆汽车。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Richmond County Coroner Mark Bowen said all three victims were pronounced dead at the scene.
output: 里士满县法医 Mark Bowen 表示，现场三名受害者均已死亡。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Authorities identified the bodies as 25-year-old Shaquia Philpot and her infant children Caysen and Cassius Williams.
output: 相关当局称，死者为 25 岁的 Shaquia Philpot 以及她的两个孩子 Caysen Williams 和 Cassius Williams。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Officials did not release details about how the family ended up in the pond.
output: 治安官并未透露三名死者死亡的具体原因。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
A witness, who was fishing in the area, found the car, Bowen said.
output: 法医 Bowen 说，当时一位正在钓鱼的目击者发现了这辆车。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The bodies were going to be sent to the Georgia Bureau of Investigation for an autopsy.
output: 三具遗体将送往乔治亚州调查局进行尸检。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The case remains under investigation.
output: 案件仍在调查中。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
"The Persians" Review: Aeschylus's Ancient Portrait of Defeat
output: 《波斯人》剧评：埃斯库罗斯笔下的失利

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
There is not much action, barely even a plot, in "The Persians." People just mill about, talking (admittedly rather intensely) about events (admittedly of the tragic kind) that happened far away.
output: 《波斯人》中没有太多动作戏，甚至不到一场。 人物只是绕来绕去，（相当激烈地）谈论在远方发生的（无疑是悲剧性）事件。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Yet this National Theater of Greece production unleashes gale-force sound and fury. At its peak, the show hits like a blow to the solar plexus, taking your breath away - the impact is only slightly dulled by watching online.
output: 然而，希腊国家大剧院却奉献了一出振聋发聩的表演。演出到达高潮时，你会感觉像是胸口挨了一拳一样无法呼吸，这种感觉就算是在线观看也没有多大分别。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
First produced in 472 B.C., Aeschylus's "The Persians" is considered the oldest surviving Greek play. This Dimitris Lignadis staging was broadcast live on Saturday from the ancient amphitheater of Epidaurus; in the spirit of the theater, no recording exists online. The venue was originally conceived as part of the city's asclepeion (a healing center) because the Greeks considered the balance between body and soul essential to good health. Let's all wistfully ponder that philosophy.
output: 埃斯库罗斯的《波斯人》是希腊现存最古老的戏剧，最早于公元前 472 年登上舞台。Dimitris Lignadis 的演出于周六从古老的 Epidaurus 圆形剧场进行现场直播，应剧院要求，不提供在线视音频。演出场地曾经是该城 asclepeion（康复中心）的一部分，因为希腊人认为在身体与心灵之间找到平衡对健康至关重要。我们都来认真思考一下这一哲理。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The show deals with the aftermath of Salamis, a naval battle in which the outnumbered Greeks routed the mighty Persian army 2,500 years ago. At a time when our horizons are closing in, it is downright vertigo-inducing to virtually join a live audience in watching (subtitled) live actors all the way in Greece as they perform a millenniums-old play.
output: 该剧讲述了 Salamis 大战之后的故事，这场海战发生在 2,500 年前，希腊人一举击溃了人多势众的波斯军队。当镜头拉近的时候，观众会产生明显的眩晕感，仿佛置身于现场的观众席，观看（有字幕）希腊剧场的演员演出这一流传了上千年的故事。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Aeschylus himself had fought at Salamis, but his play has a twist: This veteran of the winning side set his story among the defeated, casting a fairly sympathetic eye on his recent enemies" distress.
output: 埃斯库罗斯自己参与了 Salamis 之战，但与他的剧本有所出入：这位获胜方的老兵将自己的故事融入战败者之中，对敌人的痛苦投以相当同情的目光。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
A chorus of Persian men, wearing long, tan-colored skirts and white button-down shirts, opens the proceedings. They are in their capital city anxiously waiting for news of their king, Xerxes, who is off duking it out with Athens.
output: 最先出场的是身穿褐色长裙和白色纽扣衬衫的波斯男子歌队。他们在都城焦急地等待国王 Xerxes 与希腊人一决胜负的结果。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Enter Xerxes's widowed mother, Queen Atossa (Lydia Koniordou), in a rather large black gown that appears to wear her, rather than the reverse; she is a human in an exoskeleton of fabric, both vulnerable and formidable. Koniordou, who is among Greece's greatest stage actresses, knows the role inside out - she directed and starred in an earlier National Theater of Greece production of "The Persians" that played New York City Center in 2006 - and she anchors the proceedings without seemingly doing much at all. For the most part, she stands in the middle of the circular stage, effortlessly projecting smoldering fury and agonizing sorrow as the scope of the disaster that befell the home troops is revealed.
output: Xerxes 的寡母 Atossa 太后（Lydia Koniordou 饰演）身着空荡荡的黑袍上场，仿佛是穿着衣服做成的外骨骼，脆弱不堪又令人望而生畏。作为希腊最伟大的舞台剧女演员之一，Koniordou 对这一角色了如指掌，她曾执导希腊国家大剧院早前制作的《波斯人》一剧并担纲主演，该剧于 2006 年在纽约城市中心上演，她推动了故事的发展，但看起来似乎根本没做什么。大多数时候她只是站在圆形舞台中央，在知悉本国军队遭受了没顶之灾后，她不费吹灰之力就表现出了积郁的愤懑和悲痛。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The apprehension everybody was feeling is confirmed, in harrowing details, by a messenger (Argyris Pandazaras) returning from the front. In an absolutely incredible scene, he recounts the battle, whipping himself into a frenzy as the chorus members dance around him and Giorgos Poulios's drone-like score swells to what must have been a deafening level.
output: 从前线返回的信使（Argyris Pandazaras 饰演）通过令人肝肠寸断的细节让观众切实感受到忧惧。他在一个令人难以置信的场景中讲述了这场战斗，歌队成员围着他起舞，在 Giorgos Poulios 震耳欲聋的配乐声中，他陷入癫狂。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Later they are joined by Atossa's dead husband (Nikos Karathanos), summoned from the underworld, and Xerxes (Argyris Xafis), who has somehow escaped alive from the wreckage. Pieces of string on his tunic mark blood (Eva Nathena's exquisite costumes always contribute to the storytelling). The characters lament the lost lives and devastation together, in an act of communal mourning.
output: 后来，从冥府召唤出来的 Atossa 死去的丈夫（Nikos Karathanos 饰演）和幸免于难的 Xerxes（Argyris Xafis 饰演）加入了他们。他长袍上的带子血迹斑驳（Eva Nathena 设计的精美服装总是能为剧情的推动助力）。在集体哀悼的一幕中，这几个角色聚在一起，哀叹逝去的生命和战争的创伤。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Quite a bit of the classical theater we see in the United States attempts to make it more accessible in one way or another. Often this is done with relatively naturalistic line readings, in an effort to make the text less foreign, easier to digest. But Lignadis and his troupe fully embrace declamation, which may sound a little forced to modern ears but highlights the text's rhythmic power. While technically they do not sing, for example, the four lead actors essentially deliver arias, achieving an incantatory power that feels otherworldly.
output: 美国的古典剧院多半会采取一种更通俗易懂的表现手法。他们通常会采用相对自然的念白，让歌词不那么陌生，也更容易理解。但是，Lignadis 和他的剧团使用了慷慨激昂的唱腔，这对于现代观众而言可能有点生硬，却凸显了歌词的节奏力度。从技术层面上来说他们不是在歌唱，譬如四位主演本质上都是在咏叹，发挥出魔咒般的力量，让人有超凡脱俗之感。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
We never forget, though, that the play is rooted in emotions that are all too human.
output: 可是我们永远不会忘记，这出戏的根本是极其人性化的情感。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Egypt begins registering data of voters abroad for senate elections
output: 埃及启动参议院选举海外选民登记

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The National Election Authority (NEA) on Saturday began registering the data of voters aboard to begin casting their votes in the senate elections to be held on August 9 and 10, according to the NEA's official website.
output: 据国家选举机构（NEA）官网称，该机构于本周六启动了海外选民登记，以便他们能为 8 月 9 日至 10 日举行的参议院选举投票。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Voters must register their data and the diplomatic mission affiliated to their residence abroad on the NEA's website from July 25 until July 31.
output: 选民必须在 7 月 25 日至 7 月 31 日之间登录 NEA 网站，登记自己的数据及其海外住所所属的使领馆。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The NEA also published a video explaining the steps voters can take to cast their vote remotely via email, as part of precautions against the coronavirus pandemic.
output: 为预防新冠病毒传播，NEA 还发布了一段视频，向选民说明如何通过电子邮件远程投票。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The legal period of senate candidate electoral propaganda runs from July 26 until August 8, the NEA said.
output: NEA 表示，参议院候选人选举宣传的法定时间为 7 月 26 日至 8 月 8 日。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Minister of Emigration and Egyptian Expatriates Affairs Nabila Makram called on Egyptian voters abroad to participate in the election as their constitutional right.
output: 埃及移民和侨民事务部长 Nabila Makram 呼吁海外埃及选民参加选举，履行宪法赋予他们的权利。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Egypt's House of Representatives on June 17 approved a law establishing a senate, which will function as an upper house of parliament.
output: 埃及议会下院于 6 月 17 日通过了一项设立参议院的法律，参议院将行使议会上院功能。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The law passed with a two-thirds majority, with the objection of four MPs.
output: 该法律以三分之二多数票通过，有四名议员投了反对票。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The Senate will consist of 300 members, 100 of whom are elected by a closed list system, 100 elected by an individual system, and 100 members appointed by the President of the Republic.
output: 参议院将由 300 名议员组成，其中 100 人通过不公开名单选举产生，100 人通过个人选举产生，还有 100 人由总统任命。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The term of membership in the Senate will be five years, starting from the date of its first meeting. The new assembly is to be elected during the sixty days preceding the end of its term.
output: 参议院议员任期为首次会议之日起五年。下一届议会成员将在本届任期届满前六十天内选出。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
200-Plus Firefighters Respond To Karen Fire Burning In Jurupa Valley - CBS Los Angeles
output: 200 余名消防员加入朱鲁帕谷 “Karen” 山火救援

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
JURUPA VALLEY (CBSLA) - A wildland fire broke out on Saturday afternoon in Jurupa Valley, leading to a response of more than 200 firefighters.
output: 朱鲁帕谷 (CBS Los Angeles)——周六下午，朱鲁帕谷爆发了一场山火，超 200 名消防员加入到救援行动中。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The Karen Fire was reported just after 3 p.m. on Sierra Avenue and Karen Lane.
output: 下午 3 点，火势仅涉及 Sierra 大道和 Karen 巷。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The fire grew from approximately 5-10 acres to roughly 250 acres as of 8 p.m.
output: 截至晚 8 点，过火面积已从约 2-4 公顷扩大至约 100 公顷。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Containment at last check was at 50% and 225 firefighters from Cal Fire, Riverside County Fire Department, City of Corona Fire Department, and San Bernardino County Fire were on scene battling the fire.
output: 截止最后一次确认，50% 的火势已得到控制，来自加州消防局、河滨县消防局、科罗纳市消防局和圣贝纳迪诺县消防局的 225 名消防员正在现场奋力扑救。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Forward progress on the fire has been stopped but resources are expected to remain overnight to monitor conditions.
output: 目前火势已得以控制，但仍需彻夜监控。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
No injuries or structural damages have been reported, and no evacuations have been ordered.
output: 尚无人员伤亡和建筑受损的报道，当局也尚未下达强制疏散令。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Sierra Avenue between Armstrong and the San Bernardino County Line has been closed.
output: 阿姆斯特朗和圣贝纳迪诺线之间的 Sierra 大道已暂时关闭。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Israel coronavirus cases top 60,000 as infections jump
output: 以色列新冠病毒感染人数超 6 万

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
JERUSALEM (Reuters) - The number of people to test positive for coronavirus in Israel topped 60,000 on Saturday as the government struggles to contain a resurgence in infection rates.
output: 耶路撒冷（路透社）——尽管政府努力控制感染率回弹，以色列新冠病毒检测为阳性的病例仍然超过了 6 万。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The latest daily tally showed 1,770 new infections, bringing the total number of cases to 60,496, the country's health ministry reported.
output: 据该国卫生部报告，最新的每日统计发现了 1,770 例新增感染，病例总数达到 60,496 例。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
With a population of nine million, Israel has reported a total of 455 fatalities from the pandemic.
output: 以色列人口总数为 900 万，因为新冠病毒死亡的人数共计 455 人。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Israel was one of the first countries to impose a nationwide lockdown and initially was successful in clamping down on the outbreak.
output: 作为最先实施全国性封锁的国家之一，以色列早期成功遏制了疫情的蔓延。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Daily cases that numbered in the hundreds dropped to low double digits.
output: 日报告病例数从几百下降到了几十。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Concerned about the economic toll, the government eased those restrictions - too quickly, some officials have since acknowledged - and infection rates resurged.
output: 出于恢复经济的考虑，政府放松了管制，感染率回弹，已有部分官员表示此举为时过早。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Renewed sporadic closures of various sectors of the economy have deepened public vexation, sparking daily demonstrations.
output: 经济部门再次零星关闭，导致公众不满情绪加深，引发日常示威活动。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Be wary of gardening gimmicks that look too good
output: 当心那些看似美好的园艺花招

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
It might be an embarrassing thing for a plant scientist to admit, but I am a total sucker for a garden gimmick.
output: 对植物学家而言，这可能是件难以启齿的事，但我确实十分沉迷于园艺花招。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
I like to think it's because I am open-minded or maybe just irrationally optimistic, particularly as many things in the plant world are often extremely counterintuitive.
output: 往好的方面想，我认为自己是一个思想开放，或者说有点非理性乐观的人，而且植物界许多事物通常无法靠直觉判断。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
But I am not ashamed to say I have fallen for dozens of them over a lifetime in horticulture.
output: 但我并不耻于承认，我已在这种园艺花招上踩坑无数。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
While I firmly believe in the value of trying things out for yourself, if you don't fancy learning the hard way, here are some of the most common garden gimmicks I have come across.
output: 虽然我坚信自己尝试新事物的价值，但如若并不热衷于开启“地狱模式”，可以避开下面我遇到过的一些最常见的“坑人”园艺花招。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
First up, and probably the worst offender, grafted tomato-potato plants.
output: 首先，可能是最大的雷区——把番茄嫁接到土豆上。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Hailed as a revolutionary breakthrough, grafting tomato plants on to potato roots is, in fact, an old-school botanical curiosity, dating back to at least the 1920s.
output: 将番茄嫁接到土豆被誉为革命性的突破，事实上，这是一种上世纪 20 年代就有人尝试过的“老一套的玩意儿”。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
As they are both from the same family and have broadly similar internal "plumbing," you can indeed create such surgically enhanced marvels.
output: 番茄和土豆同属一科，内部“管道”大致相似，确实可以通过嫁接创造加强版奇迹。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
But here's the problem: creating resource-intensive structures like fruits and roots takes up a lot of metabolic energy, and if plants are attempting to do both their limited energies inevitably become split.
output: 但问题是，如果创造资源密集型结构，例如水果和根茎作物，则需要消耗大量能量来代谢，嫁接的植物需要同时满足两种作物的能量需求，就只能将有限的能量分流。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
That means the yields of these grafted plants are terrible and nothing like what you see in the marketing pictures.
output: 这就意味着，这些嫁接植物的产量非常低，跟你在宣传图片中看见的全然不同。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Then there is the fact that the crops mature at different rates, so to harvest the spuds you have to kill the plants before the tomatoes have ripened.
output: 另外，作物成熟的时间也不同，要收割土豆就必须扼杀还没有成熟的番茄。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
On the subject of marketing imagery, there's a lot of dodgy dealing here, too.
output: 同时，宣传图片也隐含了很多极具迷惑性的花招。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
I've seen roses Photoshopped sky blue and fruit trees with a physiologically impossible amount of fruit on their branches in some major catalogues.
output: 我在一些目录中见过用 PS 处理成天蓝色的玫瑰花，还有一些果树结出的果实数量简直不可思议。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
I've even seen photos "borrowed" from my Instagram account and used by shopping networks as images of their trial grounds.
output: 有的商家甚至从我 Instagram 上“借”走照片，在网购网站上谎称是他们的试验基地。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Sadly the work of a small minority of cavalier companies mean you have to view advertising images, particularly online, with a very sceptical eye.
output: 这些少部分无良商家的操作，让你不得不以一种怀疑的眼光来审视这些宣传图片，尤其是来自网络的图片。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
If it looks too good to be true, it probably is.
output: 如果它看起来好得不像真的，那估计确实如此。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Speaking of which, the colour blue is relatively rare in the botanical world, so if you see a dazzling new heather, orchid or cactus, shining out in the most intense "disinfectant" shade of blue, it's almost certainly been sprayed or dyed.
output: 说到蓝色玫瑰花，蓝色在植物界相对稀少，所以如果你看到新品种的绚丽帚石楠、兰花或仙人掌，在高浓度“消毒剂”下闪着蓝色光芒，那基本肯定是洒药或者染色了。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Which would be fine, so long as vendors made this clear, but they rarely ever do.
output: 如果供应商明确说明了情况，其实也没什么，但他们很少会这么做。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Blue moth orchids will revert back to their original white, but sprayed cacti and heathers, coated in a light-suppressing layer of dye, are unlikely to survive for long.
output: 蓝色蝴蝶兰会变回原来的白色，然而仙人掌和帚石楠涂上一层抑光染料后很快就会枯萎。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Finally, I have to flag up bonsai kits or, even worse, bonsai seeds, that promise miniature trees will sprout from their packets.
output: 最后，我必须曝光承诺能种出微型树的盆景套装，还有比盆景套装更糟的盆景种子。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Bonsai is not a species of plant.
output: 盆景并非一种植物。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
It's a training technique used to give the illusion of ancient trees on distant mountaintops.
output: 这是一种修剪技术，让人联想到远山上的古树。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
They are almost always started from mature shrubs that are hacked back and new growth wired in place.
output: 盆景一般是经过修剪成熟的灌木，然后再用线引导新的生长方向而形成。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
I know I'll keep falling for gimmicks, it's part of the fun of experimentation.
output: 我清楚知道自己会继续迷恋这些园艺花招，这是实验的乐趣之一。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
But side-step these ones and you may find one that actually has a chance of living up to its promise.
output: 但避开这些问题，你可能有机会买到和卖家展示一致的实物。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Spain quarantine: Do you need to quarantine in Spain?
output: 西班牙隔离措施：在西班牙需要隔离吗？

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
No - but if you return from Spain after midnight tonight, you will have to self isolate at home for 14 days.
output: 不用，但如果你在今晚 12 点之后从西班牙回来，你必须居家自我隔离 14 天。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
British Justice Secretary Humza Yousaf said: "The decision to exempt Spain earlier this week, was taken when the data showed there was an improvement in the spread of the virus.
output: 英国司法部长 Humza Yousaf 说：“本周早些时候我们决定不对从西班牙回来的人执行隔离措施，因为数据显示病毒传播情况有所改善。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
But clearly the latest data has given us cause for concern to overturn that decision.
output: 但显然，最新的数据值得我们担忧，因此不得不推翻原本的决定。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
"We appreciate that this will be disappointing. However, we have always been clear we are closely monitoring the pandemic situation in all countries and that we may require to remove a country from the list of places exempt from quarantine requirements should the virus show a resurgence."
output: 我们知道这么做会令人失望。但是，我们一直清楚地表明，我们会密切监测各国的疫情，如果病毒在某个国家死灰复燃，我们可能会要求将其从不执行隔离措施的名单中剔除。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
"It is still active and it is still deadly. Suppressing the virus, preventing it from being transmitted and protecting public health is our priority."
output: “病毒依然猖獗而致命。我们的首要任务是抑制病毒、防止病毒传播，并保护公众健康。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
No rules around UK travellers arriving in Spain have been announced, however if you are travelling to Spain you should check for local regulations in your area.
output: 政府目前还未公布关于英国人前往西班牙的规定，但如果你准备前往西班牙，你最好查阅一下自己所在区域的规定。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Spain's deputy emergency health director Maria Jose Sierra said:
output: 西班牙应急卫生副主任 Maria Jose Sierra 表示：

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
"We have important outbreaks. It could be a second wave. We'll have to see what happens in the next few weeks."
output: “我们这里爆发了重大疫情。这可能是第二波疫情。我们得关注未来几周的情况。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Pakistan's Imam-Ul-Haq Declared Fit To Bat After Warm-Up Injury
output: 巴基斯坦队 Imam-Ul-Haq 热身赛受伤后仍可继续参赛

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Pakistan and England will be facing each other in three Tests and as many T20Is.
output: 巴基斯坦队和英格兰队将作为对手在三场测试赛和三场 T20I 赛中相遇。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Pakistan batsman Imam-ul-Haq has been declared fit to bat by the team's doctor after he was hit on his left hand while batting in an intra-squad warm-up match at Derby.
output: 巴基斯坦板球运动员 Imam-ul-Haq 在德比的一场队内热身赛中左手被击中受伤，队医宣布他已经可以参加比赛了。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
"The left-handed batsman took part in warm-up session prior to the start of the second day's play," Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) informed in a statement.
output: 巴基斯坦板球委员会 (PCB) 在一份声明中表示：“这名习惯用左手的板球运动员在第二天的比赛开始前参加了一场热身赛。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
PCB Whites' Imam was hit on his left hand while batting against PCB Greens' Naseem Shah on day one of the match.
output: 在比赛的第一天，PCB 白队的 Imam 和 PCB 绿队的 Naseem Shah 对击时，左手被击中。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Imam was forced to retire hurt on Friday evening after being struck on the left hand by a ball from Shah, but was able to take part in a warm-up session in the morning and will resume his innings on the third day.
output: 周五晚上，Imam 的左手被 Shah 扔出的球击中后受伤，被迫退场，不过，他参加了早上的热身赛，将在第三天重回球场。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Over 30 Employees Test Coronavirus Positive At Single Bank Branch In Tamil Nadu
output: 泰米尔纳德邦一银行逾 30 名雇员确诊新冠

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
At least 38 employees of a national bank's main branch in Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu, have tested positive for coronavirus, officials from the bank and the local civic body have said.
output: 印度泰米尔纳德邦蒂鲁吉拉伯利市政府部门及一家国有银行的官员表示，该银行位于蒂鲁吉拉伯利市的一个主要支行有至少 38 名员工的冠状病毒检测结果呈阳性。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
According to the officials, the customers who visited the bank have also been advised to voluntarily appear for coronavirus tests.
output: 官员称，他们已经建议去过该支行的客户自愿参加病毒检测。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Earlier, a senior official of the branch who was suffering from other complications, had died of COVID-19.
output: 此前，该支行一名高级职员出现了其他并发症，后因罹患新冠肺炎去世。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The positive cases came to light after a mass medical screening camp was held at the bank recently, the officials said.
output: 官员称，最近，他们对该支行进行了大规模的医学筛检，因此发现了这些阳性病例。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Senior bank officials said the disinfection process had been completed and the bank might resume operations from tomorrow.
output: 支行领导表示，他们已经完成消毒，该银行或将于明天恢复营业。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Corporation health officials are in touch with the customers who visited the bank.
output: 公司卫生官员正在联系去过该银行的客户。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Tamil Nadu, with the highest virus cases in the country after Maharashtra, has reported an overall 2,06,737 positive cases of the virus as of Saturday.
output: 泰米尔纳德邦是印度确诊病例数量排在第二的邦，感染病例最多的是马哈拉施特拉邦，截至周六，泰米尔纳德邦报告的确诊病例总数已经达到 206,737 例。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
India's PM to attend temple groundbreaking at disputed site
output: 印度总理将出席建于争议地点的寺庙奠基仪式

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
NEW DELHI (AP) - Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi will attend a groundbreaking ceremony next month for a Hindu temple on a disputed site in northern India where a 16th century mosque was torn down by Hindu hard-liners in 1992, according to the trust overseeing the temple construction.
output: 新德里（美联社）——据监督寺庙建设的信托机构透露，印度总理 Narendra Modi 计划于下月出席建在印度北部争议地点的印度教寺庙奠基仪式，该寺庙原址为一座建于 16 世纪的清真寺，于 1992 年被印度教狂热分子夷为平地。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The ceremony is set for Aug. 5, a date organizers said was astrologically auspicious for Hindus but that also marks a year since the Indian Parliament revoked the semi-autonomous status of its only Muslim-majority state, Jammu and Kashmir.
output: 仪式定于 8 月 5 日举行，组织者称这一天对印度教徒而言是大吉之日，但这一天也是印度议会撤销其唯一的穆斯林占多数的查谟和克什米尔邦半自治权一周年。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The symbolism was impossible to miss for both supporters and opponents of Modi's Hindu nationalist Bharatiya Janata Party, or BJP, whose manifesto had for decades included pledges to strip restive Kashmir's autonomy and to build a temple to the Hindu god Ram where the Mughal-era mosque once stood, a site in the city of Ayodhya in Uttar Pradesh state that devotees believe to be Ram's birthplace.
output: Modi 所在的印度教民族主义印度人民党（BJP）的支持者和反对者都不可能错过这个具有象征意义的日子，该党在其宣言中数十年如一日地承诺夺取克什米尔的自治权，并在莫卧儿时代清真寺的原址上建造一座庙宇供奉印度教神祇拉姆，庙宇选址地位于北方邦阿约提亚市，信徒们认为这里是拉姆的出生地。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Because the coronavirus is still rampaging across India, which has reported the world's third-highest caseload, the ceremony will be broadcast live on state television and the number of participants and spectators will be limited, according to Vishwa Hindu Parishad, or the World Hindu Organization, a Hindu nationalist group allied with the BJP.
output: 新冠病毒仍在印度全境蔓延，据报道该国已成为全球感染病例数量第三的国家，有鉴于此，与印度人民党有盟友关系的印度教民族主义团体世界印度教会议（Vishwa Hindu Parishad）称，仪式将在国家电视台现场直播，会限制出席仪式的人员和观众的数量。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The temple will serve as "an enduring and immortal beaming center of social harmony, national unity and integration and awakening of the feeling of Hindutva," or Hindu way of life, the organization's spokesperson Vinod Bansal said in a news release Saturday.
output: 该组织发言人 Vinod Bansal 在周六的新闻发布会上表示，这座寺庙将成为“亘古永恒的社会和谐、民族团结与融合中心，唤醒印度教特性”。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
A century-long dispute over the site was resolved last year following the BJP's landslide election victory.
output: 继印度人民党在选举中获得压倒性胜利后，涉及该地点长达一个世纪的争端于去年得到解决。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
In November, the Supreme Court ruled in favor of the temple trust, saying that Muslim petitions would be given five acres at an alternative site.
output: 十一月，最高法院做出了有利于寺庙信托的裁定，称将另择他处向穆斯林请愿者划拨五英亩地。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Hindus hard-liners have long contended that Mughal Muslim invaders built a mosque on top of a preexisting temple in the ancient city of Ayodya.
output: 印度教狂热分子长期以来一直声称莫卧儿穆斯林侵略者在阿约提亚古城既有庙宇之上建造了一座清真寺。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
A December 1992 riot following the destruction of the mosque sparked communal violence in which about 2,000 people were killed, mostly Muslims.
output: 1992 年 12 月清真寺被拆除之后发生的骚乱引发社区暴力事件，约有 2,000 人丧生，其中大多数为穆斯林。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Meanwhile, the trial in the demolition court case continues to be heard in a special court.
output: 与此同时，特别法庭仍在审理清真寺拆除案件。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
An architect from Ahmedabad, Gujarat, Modi's home state, has proposed a towering sandstone structure 161 feet (49 meters) high with five domes.
output: 来自 Modi 家乡古吉拉特邦艾哈迈达巴德的一位建筑师提议建造一个塔状砂岩结构的寺庙，高度为 161 英尺（49 米），带有五个穹顶。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Yogi Adityanath, Uttar Pradesh's chief minister and a Hindu monk, requested that Ayodhya hold a special cleaning and purification ceremony and for all of the city's temples to light oil lamps ahead of Modi's visit, the Press Trust of India news agency reported.
output: 印度新闻信托社（PTI）报道，北方邦首席部长兼印度教修士 Yogi Adityanath 要求阿约提亚举行特别的清洁和净化仪式，全市所有寺庙在 Modi 到访之前点燃油灯。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Adityanath said the occasion marked the end of a "500-year struggle," PTI reported.
output: 印度新闻信托社报道称，Adityanath 表示这一仪式标志着一场“长达 500 年的纷争”宣告结束。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Xinhua Commentary: Outstanding returning rural migrant workers can be a rural revitalization army - Xinhuanet
output: 新华时评：把优秀返乡农民工打造成乡村振兴生力军-新华网

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Talent is the key to rural revitalization.
output: 乡村振兴，人才是关键。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Where is talent found?
output: 人才哪里找？

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Outstanding returning rural migrant workers are an indispensable force in the fight.
output: 优秀返乡农民工群体是不可或缺的生力军。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Published by Xinhua News Agency Author: Shang Haichun
output: 新华社发 商海春 作

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Xinhua News Agency, reported July 26th Headline: Outstanding returning rural migrant workers can be a force for rural revitalization - Xinhuanet
output: 新华社成都7月26日电 题：把优秀返乡农民工打造成乡村振兴生力军

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Zhang Xiong, age 34, is a resident of Guoyuan Village in Meishan City, Sichuan Province who quit his job with a salary over 10,000 yuan in Beijing and returned to his hometown to start a business in 2010.
output: 今年34岁的张雄家在四川眉山市果园村，2010年他辞掉北京月薪上万的工作返乡创业。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
After a few years of effort, his family’s vinery now earns an annual income of over a million yuan, he has gained a small amount of fame for being a wealth creator, and he has also been selected as a member of the village’s “Two Committees”.
output: 经过几年打拼，如今他经营的葡萄种植家庭农场年收入超过百万元，成为小有名气的致富带头人，还被选拔进入村“两委”班子。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
In recent years, national policies to alleviate poverty, revitalize rural areas, and benefit farmers and agriculture have inspired an increasing number of people outstanding migrant workers like Zhang Xiong to return to their hometowns to start their own businesses, which has become a new source of growth for rural areas.
output: 近年来，在国家脱贫攻坚、乡村振兴等一系列支农惠农政策激励感召下，越来越多像张雄一样的优秀农民工选择返乡创业，激活了乡村一池春水。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Sichuan is a western Chinese province with a large population and that produces high labor outflows, but thanks to the province’s “Outstanding Rural Migrant Worker Return Incentives and Cultivation Project”, in 2019 alone, the program has produced more than 8,000 village party branch secretaries from returned outstanding rural migrant workers, brought back and cultivated a labor force of 61,000 for villages, and produced over 20,000 new Party members, creating a powerful guarantee in the fight to eliminate poverty and implement rural revitalization strategies.
output: 我国西部人口大省、劳务输出大省四川，因势利导实施“优秀农民工回引培养工程”，仅2019年，就从回引的优秀农民工中产生村党支部书记8000余名，培育村后备力量6.1万名，发展党员2万余名，为打赢脱贫攻坚战和实施乡村振兴战略提供有力保证。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Hometowns are the key to moderate prosperity.
output: 小康不小康，关键看老乡。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Since reform and opening up, huge numbers of young in China have left rural villages to seek work elsewhere, and some, through their own hard work, have managed to start their own companies.
output: 改革开放以来，我国农村大量青壮年劳动力外出务工增收，有的通过打拼创办了自己的企业。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
But objectively speaking, to varying degrees, it has also led to the “hollowing out” of Chinese villages, especially those where grassroots organizations are weak, and led to the “aging and lowering” phenomenon among village Party branch secretaries and cadres, in which these groups are both getting older and have lower educational attainment, leading to disinterest among young people in continuing the work of village Party organizations with weak leadership.
output: 但客观上也导致农村“空心化”不同程度地出现，特别是农村基层组织弱化，村党支部书记和党员队伍均呈现出“一老一低”特征，即年龄老化、学历偏低，村党组织带头人队伍不强、青黄不接问题突出。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
If rural talent and other assets only flow in one direction, to the cities, in the long term this leads to “loss of blood” and “anemia” in rural areas, in turn making “revitalization” an empty slogan.
output: 如果乡村人才等要素一直单向流往城市，乡村长期处于“失血” “贫血”状态，振兴就是一句空话。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Attracting back migrant workers who are capable, conscientious, and determined to serve their hometowns, incentivizing them to return there to start businesses and become wealth creators, and then cultivating them as Party members and rural cadres to enrich the ranks of grassroots cadres is a permanent solution to the problem of young people not continuing the work of rural Party corps and grassroots Party organizations.
output: 把那些有能力、有觉悟、有志于为家乡服务的农民工吸引回来，引导他们返乡创业成为致富带头人，从中择优培养成党员、乡村干部，充实基层干部队伍，这是解决农村党员队伍和基层党组织青黄不接的治本之策。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Once outstanding rural migrant workers return, they also must be convinced to stay and do good work.
output: 优秀农民工引得回，还要让他们留得住、干得好。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
In recent years, Sichuan has focused more on Party-building among rural migrant workers, and on the basis of strict selection requirements, has established systems and mechanisms such as directed incentives for outstanding rural migrant workers to return, service guarantees, training and promotion, and selection and use which ensure they will gain from their effort, receive guarantees in their work, have things to look forward to in life, truly put down roots in the village, and feel a sense of accomplishment in their work and entrepreneurship.
output: 近年来，四川从狠抓农民工党建入手，在严格人选标准的基础上，建立优秀农民工定向回引、服务保障、培训提能、选拔使用等制度机制，让他们在能力上有提升、工作上有保障、生活上有盼头，真正在农村扎下根，干事创业有成就感。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
This is the final year of the battle to decisively end poverty, and talent is the key factor to establish the connection between poverty alleviation and rural revitalization.
output: 今年是决战脱贫攻坚的收官之年，做好脱贫攻坚与乡村振兴的衔接，人才是关键因素。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Party committees and governments at every level should prioritize rural migrant workers who return to their hometowns, and should use comprehensive measures to form them into a work corps and army that is willing to stay, capable of contributing, and unwilling to leave, so that they can serve as a powerful organizational guarantee and talent pool that supports rural poverty elimination and prosperity building efforts, as well as rural development and revitalization.
output: 各级党委政府要高度重视优秀返乡农民工这一群体，通过综合措施，把他们打造成一支留得住、能战斗、带不走的工作队、生力军，为农村脱贫奔小康和发展振兴提供强有力的组织保障和人才支撑。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Thanks to the pandemic, this year’s university graduates are a very special class: On the evening of July 11th, the “Bilibili Summer Graduation Songs” offered up a special online show for new graduates with performances from musicians such as Lao Lang, Pu Shu, Li Yuchun, and Mao Buyi to give graduates a sendoff of music and good wishes.
output: 因为遭遇疫情，今年的大学毕业生是很特殊的一届，7月11日晚，bilibili夏日毕业歌会为毕业生们带来一场特殊的线上直播演出，老狼、朴树、李宇春、毛不易等音乐人为应届毕业生送上歌声和祝福。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The famous host of Up, Seal Wu, performed his song “Wild Grass”, a rap song based on Lu Xun’s poem of the same name, which is very popular with young people.
output: 知名up主SealWu吴一凡还带来了一首《野草》，这是他根据鲁迅的同名散文诗集改编创作的说唱风歌曲，在年轻人中极受欢迎。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Because of the pandemic, many graduates will not be able to enjoy the sounds and sights of receiving their diploma in person, so they moved the ritual and all of its sensations online.
output: 由于疫情的关系，不少毕业生没能体会现场拨穗、授学位证的仪式感，他们就把仪式感转移到了线上。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Statistics show that peak viewership of the 2.5 hour special event exceeded 35 million.
output: 数据显示，这场时长2.5小时的歌会，直播人气峰值超过3500万。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
“Follow your heart, seize opportunities, don’t worry about the consequences, and you’ll reap rewards you never expected. “
output: “遵循自己的内心吧，把握住机会，不计较后果，有时反而会有意想不到的收获。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Although it was a song for graduates, it moved many non-graduates as well.
output: 虽说是毕业歌会，很多歌曲也让非应届毕业生感动。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
“After watching the whole presentation, I wanted to cry for the beauty and regrets of youth, because no matter what, they are worth remembering, yet we all have to find the courage to carry on. “
output: “整场看下来真的想哭，谁的青春都充满美好和遗憾，但都值得怀念，都要勇敢走下去。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Natural Ecology in Beijing Continues to Improve, attracting More than 500 Kinds of Wildlife to "Settle" in the City - Ecns.cn
output: 北京自然生态持续向好 吸引500余种野生动物城市“定居 ” - 中新网

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
2020-07-26 05:03:17 Source: Beijing Youth Daily Author: Wang Sishuo Editor: Wang Sishuo
output: 2020-07-26 05:03:17 来源：北京青年报 作者：王思硕 责任编辑：王思硕

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Natural ecology in Beijing continues to improve, attracting wildlife to "settle" in the city
output: 首都自然生态持续向好 吸引野生动物城市“定居”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Beijing now has more than 500 species of wild animals.
output: 北京野生动物已达500余种

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
(Reporter Wang Bin) The Beijing Youth Daily reporter learned from the Beijing Gardening and Greening Bureau that in recent years, as the natural ecology of the capital continues to improve, the species and number of wild animals had also continued to increase.
output: 本报讯(记者 王斌)北京青年报记者从市园林绿化局获悉，近年来随着首都自然生态环境的持续向好，野生动物的种类和数量也随之持续增加。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
At present, the number of terrestrial vertebrate wildlife inhabiting Beijing exceeds 500, including national first-level protected animals such as the brown-eared pheasant and black stork, as well as national second-class protected animals such as the goral, whooper swan, grey crane and mandarin duck.
output: 目前，栖息北京的陆生脊椎野生动物已增加至500余种，包括褐马鸡、黑鹳等国家一级保护动物，以及斑羚、大天鹅、灰鹤、鸳鸯等国家二级保护动物。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Whether urban forests planted within the Second Ring Road or a small wetland embedded between buildings, it not only brings nature's rustic charm to the citizens of the capital, but also attracts wild animals to "settle" in the city.
output: 无论是种进二环内的一处处城市森林，还是嵌入楼宇之间的小微湿地，不仅为首都市民带来了大自然的野趣，也吸引着野生动物到城市里“定居 ” 。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
In the summer, the Songshan Nature Reserve in the Yanshan Mountains in the north-west of Yanqing District is full of life.
output: 盛夏时节，位于延庆区西北部燕山山脉中的松山国家级自然保护区内一派生机勃勃。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
A raccoon dog is playing by a creek, while two badgers are playing with each other nearby.
output: 一只貉在山涧旁悠闲玩耍，一旁，两只狗獾互相打闹起来。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
When looking back, you can see that a wild boar, unable to resist the "itch" on its body, is rubbing against a tree. Hu Qiaoli, Director of the Songshan Nature Reserve Management Office, said that by the end of 2019, 178 species of wildlife, including the golden eagle, a national first-level protected animal, as well as the koklass pheasant and gazelles, national second-level protected animals, have been living in this green zone with a total area of more than 6,200 hectares, and nearly a third of wildlife species in Beijing could be found here.
output: 回过头来，一只野猪忍不住身上的“刺挠”，正使劲蹭着树皮。松山国家级自然保护区管理处主任胡巧立介绍，截至2019年底，在这片总面积超过6200公顷的绿海中，生活着包括国家一级保护动物金雕和国家二级保护动物勺鸡、斑羚在内的178种野生动物，全市近三分之一的野生动物种类都能在这里见到踪迹。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
"Here in Songshan, wild animals are the real 'owners' and our staff can at best be thought of as their 'bodyguards'. ”
output: “在松山，野生动物是真正的‘主人’，我们工作人员充其量只能算是人家的‘保镖’。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Hu Qiaoli said, in order to understand the situation of wildlife in the reserve, more than 30 professional patrol members patrol along 16 specifically developed protection routes every day, and every month there is a major one-day round trip for them to walk through almost the entire reserve.
output: 胡巧立说，为了实地了解保护区内野生动植物的情况，每天都有30多名专业巡护队员，沿着16条精心制定的保护路线巡查，每个月还会有一趟“转大圈”，用一整天的时间几乎走遍整个保护区。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
"During the patrols, they not only check and record the biodiversity, but also the conditions of artificial bird nests, in addition to rescuing injured wildlife, installing infrared cameras in the field, and so on. ”
output: “在巡查时，不光要检查记录生物多样性情况，还要检查安装人工鸟巢，救护受伤的野生动物，安装野外红外相机等等。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Now, the Songshan Nature Reserve has more than 200 infrared cameras to record the living conditions of wildlife in the forest.
output: 松山国家级自然保护区现已安装200余台红外相机，记录下林中野生动物的生活状态。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Hu Qiaoli said that as the reserve's biodiversity has improved over the past few years, more and more wild animals have appeared on camera, with leopard cats, raccoons dogs, and hog-nosed badgers becoming "regular guests"; meanwhile, the goral, a national second-level protected animal, has been captured even more frequently.
output: 胡巧立介绍，随着这几年保护区生物多样性不断丰富，越来越多的野生动物出现在镜头之中，豹猫、貉和猪獾已经成为“常驻嘉宾”，国家二级保护动物斑羚的“出镜率”也越来越高。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Zhang Zhiming, Director of the Wildlife and Wetland Protection Department of the Beijing Gardening and Greening Bureau, said that the number of terrestrial vertebrate wildlife in Beijing has increased from 461 species in 1994 to more than 500 species today, and that the number of wildlife species in Beijing has continued to increase in recent years.
output: 北京市园林绿化局野生动植物和湿地保护处处长张志明介绍，北京陆生脊椎野生动物已从1994年的461种，增加到现在的500多种，北京的野生动物种类和数量近年来持续增加。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The increasingly common presence of wildlife in the city is closely related to the continuous upgrading of urban greening in Beijing in recent years.
output: 城市中野生动物的身影越发常见，与近年来首都城市绿化不断升级密切相关。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
In particular, the new round of One Million Mu of forestation and greening construction, which began in 2018, intends to reshape the urban ecological environment, enhance the ecological functions of woodlands and greenbelts, and highlight the concept of being "close-to-nature".
output: 特别是2018年开始的新一轮百万亩造林绿化建设，提出要重塑城市生态环境，提升林地绿地的生态功能，突出“近自然”理念。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The plan aims to achieve interconnection and interaction with the surrounding greenbelts, so that wild animals can easily "visit their relatives and friends", and the trees planted are nectar and food source plants that these animals love.
output: 规划上力求与周边绿地实现互联互动，方便野生动物“走亲访友”，种的树也都是动物们喜爱的蜜源、食源植物。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Agricultural Modernization in the Black Land -- Xinhua Net
output: 黑土地“种”出农业现代化-新华网

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Xinhua News Agency, Harbin, July 26th, 2020 Title: Agricultural Modernization in the Black Land
output: 新华社哈尔滨7月26日电 题：黑土地“种”出农业现代化

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
In mid-summer, two planes that spray pesticides flew above the Ten Thousand Mu High-Yield Demonstration Field of the Second Work Station, Fifth Management Area, Youyi Farm, forming two white lines, and the large characters “The World’s No.1 Farm” were extremely clear as formed by the black rice seedlings in the green field.
output: 盛夏，两架喷施药剂飞机从友谊农场第五管理区第二作业站的万亩高产示范田掠过，形成两道白线，绿色田野里用黑色稻苗种出的“天下第一场”几个大字格外醒目。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Kong Lingqiang, Director of the Work Station, said that such planes were able to spray pesticides over 6,000 mu (400 hectares) of fields per day, the efficiency of which was eight times unmanned aerial vehicle, and hundreds of times that of human labor.
output: 这个作业站站长孔令强说，这种飞机一天能对6000多亩耕地喷施药剂，效率约是无人机的8倍，是人工的数百倍。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The farm is located in Youyi County, Heilongjiang Province, which is the largest grain production base of China, and judging from the swish of cutting the rice seedlings with sickles in the past to the rumble of motors today, we can see that China’s traditional agriculture and farm have changed tremendously in the black land.
output: 这个农场位于我国第一产粮大省黑龙江省友谊县境内，从过去“唰唰”的割稻声穿越到如今“隆隆”的马达声，中华传统农耕与农场在这片黑土带上实现蜕变。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Apart from planes, satellites are also used in the modernized agricultural production of Youyi Farm.
output: 除了飞机，卫星也被用于友谊农场现代化农业生产中。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Kong Lingqiang stated that on one hand, they utilized satellite remote sensing technology to achieve accurate fertilization and reduce inputs in agriculture and pollution; on the other , satellite navigation technology improves the standardized work of agricultural machines in the field.
output: 孔令强介绍，一方面，他们利用卫星遥感技术实现精准施肥，降低农业投入，减少污染；另一方面，卫星导航技术可以提高农机田间标准化作业水平。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
During the production of rice this year, the farm extended the area utilizing satellite navigation unmanned driving transplantation technology to 30,000 mu (2,000 hectares) from 3,000 mu (200 hectares) last year.
output: 在今年的水稻生产过程中，农场将卫星导航无人驾驶插秧技术的作业面积从去年的3000亩扩展到30000亩。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Such technology enables more even transplantation of rice seedlings, which maximizes the use of sunlight and arable fields, saving RMB 16 on human labor per mu on average.
output: 这项技术令秧苗栽植更加均匀，可使阳光和耕地资源利用最大化，每亩还能节约16元人工成本。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The attempt to use new information technologies and intelligent technologies in the farm’s agricultural production is the largest agricultural machine group in China.
output: 农场在农业生产中尝试信息化、智能化等新技术，形成了从地面到天空的我国规模最大的农业机械群。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
According to statistics, there are 49,000 agricultural machines held by the farms at present, and the overall mechanization rate is 99.8%.
output: 据统计，目前农场农机总保有量4.9万台（件）， 田间综合机械化率达99.8%。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The rates of using GPS satellite navigation for agricultural machines, accurate sowing in dry land, and using machines with high horsepower on dry land are all 100%.
output: 农机作业实现GPS卫星导航100%、旱田精密播种100%、旱田大马力机车作业100%。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
“Green agriculture, smart agriculture, and digital agriculture are the directions of exploration in agricultural modernization, ”
output: “绿色农业、智慧农业、数字农业是农业现代化的探路方向 。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Liu Hualian, President of Youyi Farm, said.
output: 友谊农场场长刘化莲说。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The key to agricultural modernization is scientific and technological advancements.
output: 农业现代化关键在于科技进步。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The Heilongjiang Agricultural Reclamation Bureau, on behalf of the farms it represents, has fully acted as the “aircraft carrier” of modernized agriculture in recent years, and has firstly built a modern agricultural system characterized by scaled planting, standardized production, and industrialized operation.
output: 以农场为代表的黑龙江农垦近年发挥现代化大农业“航母”示范、引领作用，初步建立起规模化种植、标准化生产、产业化经营为主导的现代农业产业体系。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
In the suburb of Youyi County, there is an agricultural machine exhibition park covering an area of 350,000 square meters.
output: 在友谊县郊区，有一个占地面积35万平方米的农机博览园。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
It exhibits more than 140 agricultural machines and tools introduced and used by the Heilongjiang Agricultural Reclamation Bureau over the past years.
output: 这里集中展出了黑龙江农垦多年来引进、使用过的140多台（件）农机具。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Those agricultural machines, tools, and farms bear witness the modernization process of Chinese agriculture.
output: 这些农机具与农场见证了我国农业现代化发展历程。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Sacrifice Individual Interests for the Greater Good: the Direct Impact on People to be Relocated in Jiangkou River, Hefei City, Anhui Province -- Xinhua Net
output: 舍小家为大家 — — 安徽合肥蒋口河联圩群众转移直击-新华网

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Hefei, July 26th, 2020 (Xinhua) Title: Sacrifice Individual Interests for the Greater Good: the Direct Impact on People to be Relocated in Jiangkou River, Hefei City, Anhui Province
output: 新华社合肥7月26日电 题：舍小家为大家 — — 安徽合肥蒋口河联圩群众转移直击

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Edited by Chen Shangying, Wang Liwu and Liu Xiacun
output: 新华社记者陈尚营、王立武、刘夏村

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
At 4 p.m. on July 25th, Fu Kunbao wore a pair of rubber boots which were covered with mud as he walked from the front room to the back, scurrying to pack items with his wife Zhou Yan.
output: 7月25日下午4点多，傅昆宝穿着糊满泥巴的胶鞋，从前屋到后屋，和妻子周燕来来回回地忙着收拾东西。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
“When we got the call asking us to relocated from our village cadres, I was cutting the grass in the field. ”
output: “接到村干部让转移的电话，我还在田里薅草。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Fu Kunbao said that he rented over 60 mu field to plant rice, the growth of which was healthy, “I just sprayed the pesticide yesterday, the tools were even not packed. ”
output: 傅昆宝说，他流转了60多亩地，种了水稻，眼下长势不错 ， “ 昨天还打了药，工具啥的还都没收拾呢。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Fu Kunbao pointed to the pesticide sprayer in the corner, “No one wants his home to be lost in a flood, but we have to sacrifice our own interests for the public good. ”
output: 傅昆宝指了指放在角落里的农药喷雾器 ， “谁都不愿家里被淹，舍小家为大家吧 。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
To cope with the continuous high water levels at Chaohu Lake and the possible strong downpour, Hefei City is preparing to use a joint embankment at Jiangkou River, where Fu Kunbao’s home is located, to diverge the flood and save water.
output: 为应对巢湖持续高水位压力和可能的强降雨，安徽省合肥市准备在26日启用傅昆宝家所在的蒋口河联圩分洪蓄水。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The joint embankment of Jiangkou River is located in Feixi County, which is close to the bank of Chaohu Lake.
output: 蒋口河联圩位于肥西县，紧邻巢湖大堤。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Thousands of villagers in Yandian Village and Sanhe Town will be relocated.
output: 圩内有涉及严店乡和三河镇的几千名村民需要转移。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
By 16:00 on July 25th, the water level of Chaohu Lake, the fifth largest freshwater lake in China, was still 13.2 meters, 0.7 meter higher than the safety level.
output: 截至25日16时，我国第五大淡水湖巢湖水位依然维持在13.2米的高位，超保证水位0.7米。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The kitchen of Fu Kunbao’s home was neat, with a bowl of pumpkin dishes on the table, and some eggs and vegetables in sauce in the fridge.
output: 傅昆宝家的厨房收拾得干干净净，桌上放着一盆南瓜头菜，冰箱里还有鸡蛋和一些卤菜。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
“I never thought I’d have to move away, and the current water level of Jiangkou River looks safe. ”
output: “没想到要搬，蒋口河的水目前看还好 。 ”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Zhou Yan said that her house is a bungalow, and she hasn’t found a suitable place to store the large items for now.
output: 周燕说，家里是平房，一些大物件暂时还没想好放到哪里。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
“I can pack expensive and important items first, and the large items like the fridge and television can be placed at a neighbor’s or relative’s house which is at a higher elevation. ”
output: “先把贵重的物品收拾好，冰箱、电视机这些大件可以暂时先放到地势高的邻居或者亲戚家。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Wang Liwen, village cadre, helped Fu Kunbao make plans.
output: 村干部王礼稳给傅昆宝出主意。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Wang Liwen was in charge of the relocation of 13 households, so he informed the villagers one by one, and confirmed the settlement plan with everyone.
output: 王礼稳负责13户村民的转移安置工作，一户一户通知，确认每个人的安置方案。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The nearest resettlement place to Fu Kunbao’s home is Suxiao Primary School in Yandian Village, which was two kilometers away.
output: 距离傅昆宝家最近的安置点是严店乡苏小小学，2公里左右的路程。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Apart from the large items, the over 1,000 jin (500 kg) of grain and newly bought furniture was also a headache Fu Kunbao and his wife.
output: 除了大件，让傅昆宝两口子头疼的还有家里1000多斤粮食和新买的一些家具。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
“We are going to move the grain to our relative’s home, but we have no way to move the furniture. ”
output: “粮食准备拖到亲戚家，家具没办法搬了。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
After discussion, the couple placed several chairs beneath their new bed, raising it by about 0.5 meters.
output: 夫妻俩一商量，在新买的床下面垫上凳子，把床抬高了大概半米。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
At 6 p.m., Fu Kunbao began to move these items to his relative’s home by tricycle, while Zhou Yan continued to pack at home.
output: 下午6点，傅昆宝开始用三轮车往亲戚家运东西，周燕继续在家里收拾。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
At 11 p.m., the couple checked everything across the home, shut down the electricity, and left for the settlement place.
output: 晚上11点多，夫妻俩在家里前前后后看了一遍，拉上了电闸，准备去安置点。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
“We hope that the flooding ends soon, ”
output: “希望水早点退吧。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Fu Kunbao said.
output: 傅昆宝说。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
At 9:30 a.m. on July 26th, this journalist saw at Jiangkou River that the local government was fully prepared to divert the flood.
output: 7月26日上午9点半，记者在蒋口河联圩现场看到，当地已做好分洪前各项准备。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Zhang Jike and Lin Xiaozhai Form a Team to Support Youth with Great Muscles - Xinhua Net
output: 张继科林小宅组队力挺有肌少年-新华网

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The inspiring competitive show for youth sports, We Are The One, was officially broadcast on Hunan TV on July 11.
output: 运动少年热血竞技秀《运动吧少年》在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The team leader Zhang Jike and Sports Assistant Lin Xiaozhai are from different fields, but worked together, and commenters Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui were each unique in their own way, but the appearance of the hardcore “enormous” strength gin pole made the program more “exciting”.
output: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨界同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
During the first episode, 11 young athletes came to the strength arena, and their appearance stunned the audience while arousing significant attention to their “fierce conflict” “robust confrontation”, and “strong hearts”.
output: 首集中,11位运动少年亮相力量赛道,外形惊艳现场观众的同时,竞技台上的“强冲突”“强对抗”“强心脏”也受到关注。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Among them, the “fierce conflict” was from the awe-inspiring student athlete Qiao Wenyi, who publicly provoked “handsome boy” Xu Zhibin on the same racetrack with him when he joked that Xu Zhibin should be on a singing and dancing show, insulting his competitor’s appearance, and even saying that “if you lose, don’t cry or your make-up will run”.
output: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅同赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
His words made all the young people and sports officials gasp.
output: 一番言论让场上的少年和运动领队们都倒吸一口凉气。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The “robust confrontation” was more like a battle between masters, with “Big Devil” Sun Jianqi competing against the formidable Zhang Xindong in a stunning match.
output: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,上演强强对决。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Their identity was also surprising, with Sun Jianqi an actor who is passionate about fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired commando who has won military medals three times.
output: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及,孙健淇是热爱健身的演员,张鑫栋则是退役特战队员、三次勇士勋章获得者。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
At the start of the match, the two pulled on the small gin pole with all their strength, and the audience was anxious to see their more intense confrontation at the large gin pole.
output: 比赛一开始,两位少年就拼尽全力快速拔出小杆,在大杆上的持久对抗让现场观众为他们捏了一把汗。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The atmosphere was tense as one of the hosts of the program, Zhang Jike, also watched the battle intently.
output: 在紧张的赛况下,张继科作为《运动吧少年》运动领队之一,也在一旁认真观战。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
When giving commentary, he was very careful, patiently encouraging the loser and helping him review his mistakes.
output: 在点评环节,他也十分细心,对输了比赛的一方少年耐心鼓励,帮助复盘过程中的每一个失误点。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
But sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai was a marvelous helper, who never concealed her appreciation for these good-looking and competitive young athletes.
output: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值实力在线的少年们的欣赏。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
After learning about their over-loaded daily training, she admired them a lot.
output: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时,更是心生敬佩。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The other team leaders, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, were each unique in their own way, with one being a calm “predictor”, while the other was the “bubbly optimistic girl” who eased the tension with her warm smile.
output: 同样是运动领队的林丹和傅园慧则各有风格,一个是气定神闲派“预言家 ” , 一个则是用笑容驱散紧张氛围的“洪荒少女 ” 。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
As sports assistants, Jike and Liu Ye also discussed several funny topics around young athletes.
output: 另外,吉克隽逸和刘烨作为运动助理,也围绕运动少年制造了不少爆笑话题。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Fire in Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes, France: Parochial Volunteer Who was Kind and Taciturn Confessed to Arson-Ecns.cn
output: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火 平时和善寡言-中新网

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
July 26 (Ecns.cn) According to reports from foreign media, on July 18, the Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes, a religious, historical, and architectural treasure, was seriously damaged in a fire, and the great organ was completely destroyed.
output: 中新网7月26日电 据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
On the 26th (CET), Nantes prosecutors announced that a parochial volunteer who was responsible for the security of the cathedral had been charged with "arson and destruction."
output: 当地时间26日，南特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是“纵火毁坏” 。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The suspect has already pleaded guilty.
output: 他已承认，是自己在教堂里点火。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
According to the report, the local prosecutor Cenas said that the 39-year-old parochial volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.
output: 报道称，当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
His lawyer said that the arsonist now regrets doing such a thing.
output: 此人的律师则表示，纵火者现在很后悔做出这种事。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
He entered France via an asylum claim a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in by the church.
output: 此人几年前通过避难的途径，进入法国，在本次火灾事发地教区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Prosecutors noted that recently, the suspect tried to update his visa and was in the process of dialogue with the police.
output: 检方指出，最近，他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
But workers in the cathedral couldn’t believe that the believer, who was kind and taciturn, would destroy the church he loved so much.
output: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信，这名平时非常善良、面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会毁坏他如此热爱的教堂。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer was questioned by police about inconsistencies in his narrative, but he was later released.
output: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不通的问题，而接受过警方问询调查，但他后来被释放。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Image shows rescue by firefighters at the scene.
output: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
On the evening of the 25th, the man was again subpoenaed as a result of new evidence obtained by professional engineers of the laboratory of the Paris Central Police Station.
output: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
This time, the man admitted to his arson.
output: 这一次，男子承认了自己纵火的行为。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
If convicted of the crime of deliberate arson and destruction, the suspect will face 10 years' imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.
output: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
It was reported that the fire caused serious damage to the Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes: the pipe organ in the church was completely burned and the stained glass window behind the pipe organ was also seriously damaged.
output: 报道称，此次大火给圣皮埃尔与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，管风琴后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Brunel, the chief architect of French Built Heritage Conservation, believes that a conservative estimate of the required cathedral restoration work would take at least three years.
output: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计，南特大教堂复原工作至少要有3年。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Comprehensive News: The Unilateralism of the United States Destroys Sino-US Relations, International Opinion Supports China’s Countermeasures -- Xinhua Net
output: 综合消息：美单边主义破坏两国关系 国际舆论支持中国对美反制-新华网

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
BEIJING, July 26, 2020 (Xinhua, by foreign correspondents) On the morning of July 24, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People’s Republic of China announced to the US Embassy in China its decision to withdraw its consent for the establishment and operation of the US Consulate General in Chengdu, and the Ministry also made specific requirements for the cessation of all operations and events by the Consulate General.
output: 新华社北京7月26日电 综合新华社驻外记者报道：7月24日上午，中国外交部通知美国驻华使馆，中方决定撤销对美国驻成都总领事馆的设立和运行许可，并对该总领事馆停止一切业务和活动提出具体要求。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
International opinion holds the view that the unilateralism adopted by the US severely disturbs normal Sino-US relations, and China’s response to the irrational aggression of the US and its countermeasures against the US are proper and essential.
output: 国际舆论认为，美国采取的单边主义措施给中美两国关系造成严重困扰，中国对美方无理挑衅做出回应，采取反制措施是正当和必要的。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Andres Borquez, Directer of the China Research Center, Institute of International Studies at the University of Chile said that the unilateralism of the US destroyed the bridge between the people of the two countries, leading to the current crisis in Sino-US relations.
output: 智利大学国际问题研究所中国研究中心主任安德烈斯·博尔克斯说，美国的单边主义措施破坏了中美两国人民之间理解的桥梁，使两个大国关系遭遇危机。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Therefore, China’s announcement of its closure of the General Consulate of the United States in Chengdu is a countermeasure against such unilateralism which conforms to the rules of foreign affairs.
output: 中国通知美国关闭其驻成都总领事馆是对美单边措施的反制，符合外交惯例。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Patricio Giusto, Professor of the Pontifical Catholic University of Argentina and Director of China-Argentina Research Center held the view that,\ China’s decisions were proper and essential countermeasures against the aggression of the US, which was not targeted at its general public.
output: 阿根廷天主教大学教授、阿中研究中心主任帕特里西奥·朱斯托认为，中方上述决定是对美国先前挑衅的正当、必要的反制措施，并非针对普通美国民众。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The US tried to conceal their bad countermeasures against COVID-19 by exerting pressure on China to shift its public attention.
output: 美国试图通过施压中国达到掩盖其应对新冠疫情不力的目的，转移美国民众注意力。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Bambang Suryono, Chairman of the Asian Creative Research Center, a think-tank in Indonesia, said that the aggressive attitude of the US severely disturbs normal Sino-US relations and brings about severe challenges.
output: 印度尼西亚智库亚洲创新研究中心主席班邦·苏尔约诺说，美国采取挑衅性外交姿态，给中美两国关系造成严重困扰，两国关系面临严峻挑战。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Thus, China’s announcement of its closure of the General Consulate of the United States in Chengdu is a normal countermeasure which conforms to the rules of foreign affairs and shows China’s principle and stance to firmly defend their self-interests whilst embodying its rationality and principled position, and China’s etiquette of China’s coping with foreign affairs.
output: 中国通知美国关闭其驻成都总领事馆是正常反制措施，符合外交惯例，既体现了中国坚决维护自身利益的原则立场，又体现了中国外交的有理有利有节。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Francis Semwenza, a current affairs commentator of Tanzania, said that, China’s decisions were proper and essential responses to the aggression of the US.
output: 坦桑尼亚时事评论员弗朗西斯·塞姆温扎说，中方上述决定是针对美国挑衅做出的正当且必要的回应。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
For the re-normalization of Sino-US relations, the US government should actively improve its relationship with China, and quit its intervention in China’s domestic affairs.
output: 中美关系要重归正常，美方应主动改善与中国关系，停止干涉中国内政。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The US government should focus more on win-win situations in both economic growth and politics, as well as benefiting people of both the two countries and even the whole global community.
output: 美国应着眼于如何与中国在经济和政治上取得共赢，如何造福于两国人民乃至整个国际社会。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Ali Yousif, Executive Director of the Sudan-based Association of Arab-Chinese Friendship, said that, the countermeasures forced to be taken were proper and essential responses to the irrational behavior of the US, which conformed to the basic rules of the international law and international relations, as well as the rules of foreign affairs.
output: 总部位于苏丹的阿拉伯－中国友好协会联合会执行主任阿里·优素福说，中国被迫采取的反制措施是对美方无理行径的正当和必要反应，符合国际法和国际关系基本准则，也符合外交惯例。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The requirement to close the General Consulate of China in Houston seriously disobeyed the basic rules of the international law and international relations.
output: 此前美方要求关闭中国驻休斯敦总领事馆严重违反国际法和国际关系基本准则。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
And he hoped the US would cancel the relevant decisions and create necessary conditions for the re-normalization of Sino-US relations.
output: 希望美方撤销此前有关决定，为两国关系重归正常创造必要条件。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
An editorial in Singapore’s Lianhe Zaobao said that the broader strategic blueprint of the US was to contain China, and prohibit its continuous rise.
output: 新加坡《联合早报》发表社论说，美国更大的战略意图是要围堵中国，阻止中国继续崛起。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
In face of the increasingly tight aggression, China was unwilling to witness the continuous deterioration of Sino-US relations, but it had no other choice but to take countermeasures.
output: 面对美国的步步紧逼，中方虽然很不愿意看到中美关系继续恶化，但不得不采取反制措施。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
(Journalists engaging in the report: Yin Nan, Zhang Xiaoran, Ni Ruijie, Liang Hui, Gao Zhu, Li Sibo, Ma Yichong, Wang Lili)
output: （参与记者：尹南、张笑然、倪瑞捷、梁辉、高竹、李斯博、马意翀、王丽丽）

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Guangzhou, July 26 (Xinhua, Mao Xin) - This reporter learned that the Guangdong Coast Guard Bureau recently cooperated with the Guangzhou Customs District and the Guangdong Provincial Public Security Department to destroy a huge smuggling gang of refined oil products, which was initially found to have smuggled a total of about 120,000 tons of refined oil products since 2019, with a value of about RMB 800 million, and to have evaded taxes of about RMB 240 million.
output: 新华社广州7月26日电(记者毛鑫)记者从广东海警局了解到，近日，该局联合广州海关、公安部门，打掉一个特大走私成品油团伙，初步查证该团伙自2019年以来共走私成品油约12万吨，案值约8亿元人民币，偷逃税款约2.4亿元。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The Guangdong Coast Guard Bureau and the Anti-smuggling Department of the Guangzhou Customs District joined hands in gradually mapping out the division of labor and organizational structure of the gang.
output: 广东海警局与海关缉私部门联合逐步摸清了该团伙的人员分工和组织架构。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
On July 8, the Guangdong Coast Guard Bureau, Guangzhou Customs District, and Guangdong Provincial Public Security Department were united to carry out a draw-in action in Guangzhou, Foshan, the waters of the Pearl River Estuary and other places, seizing four suspected smuggling vessels; the refined oil products found in the vessels and oil depots totaled 4,700 tons, while a number of related capital accounts were frozen.
output: 7月8日，海警、海关、公安部门分别在广州、佛山等地以及珠江口海域开展统一收网行动，现场查扣涉嫌走私船舶4艘，分别在涉案船舶和油库查扣成品油共计4700吨，并冻结一批资金账户。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
It was learned that a total of eight naval vessels and two helicopters were deployed in this joint manhunt, and several action squads were set up to crack down on smuggling at sea and illegal operations on land collaboratively, and during the action, all 35 major suspects were arrested.
output: 据了解，此次联合行动共出动舰艇8艘、直升机2架，分成多个行动小组协同作战，对海上走私、陆上非法经营等环节进行全链条打击，35名主要犯罪嫌疑人全部到案。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The case is currently under further investigation.
output: 目前该案正在进一步侦办中。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
The relevant person from the Guangdong Coast Guard Bureau said that in the future, they would continue to intensively combat smuggling and all kinds of illegal and criminal activities at sea in order to maintain good order in the waters under its jurisdiction.
output: 广东海警局相关负责人表示，未来将继续保持高压态势，打击海上各类走私违法犯罪活动，维护好辖区海域良好秩序。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Hurricane "Hanna" Landing in Texas May Trigger Surges and Flash Floods - China News
output: 飓风“汉娜”登陆美得州 或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
July 26 (China News) According to reports in foreign media, hurricane “Hanna” landed in Texas at 5:00 p.m. local time on July 25th, bringing strong breeze and rainstorms, surges, and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.
output: 中新网7月26日电 综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5时，飓风“汉娜”登陆美国得克萨斯州，将给得州带来强风暴雨、河水暴涨，还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
According to the National Hurricane Center, Hanna is expected to carry rainstorms across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, causing surges and life-threatening flash floods.
output: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风“汉娜”会挟带暴雨，扫过得州南部与东北部部分地区，雨势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪爆发。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
It was reported that the area from the south of Corpus Christi to the estuary of the Rio Grande River was the area most seriously affected by Hanna, while large flash floods may break out in the Rio Grande Valley.
output: 报道称，受飓风“汉娜”影响最严重的是科珀斯克里斯蒂市以南到格兰德河河口地区，而里奥格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Abbott, governor of Texas, said on July 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. "
output: 得州州长阿博特25日表示：“任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。”

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Thirty two counties in the state have entered a state of emergency due to the hurricane.
output: 该州有32个郡因为飓风进入灾难紧急状态。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents were ready for action.
output: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，居民严阵以待。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Abbott also said that the hurricane cannot allowed to bring more casualties to Texas during the pandemic outbreak.
output: 阿博特还说，在得州正在遭遇新冠疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给得州带来更多伤亡。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas was expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on July 26th, and 3 to 5 inches in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.
output: 据报道，得州南部地区降水量预计将在26日夜间达到6至12英寸，得克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3至5英寸的降雨。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna formed earlier than in the previous Atlantic hurricane seasons.
output: 由于全球变暖等因素影响，“汉娜”的形成早于以往的大西洋飓风季。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Normally, the first hurricanes in the Atlantic don't form until mid-August.
output: 一般情况下，大西洋的第一场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Poland to Withdraw from the European Treaty on Violence against Women
output: 波兰将退出欧洲防止对女子施暴的条约

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women, the country's Justice Ministry said Saturday.
output: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Poland's right-wing government cabinet said the treaty violated the rights of parents by requiring schools to teach students about gender issues.
output: 波兰右翼的政府内阁表示，该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题，践踏了学生父母的权利。

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Chinese:
Justice Minister Ziobro said at a press conference that his ministry will submit a request on Monday to the Ministry of Labor and the Family to begin withdrawing from the treaty.
output: 波兰司法部长焦布洛举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向劳工和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。

instruction:
